metadata.description:
Collects Amazing Spider-Man #666-673, Venom #6-9, Spider-Island: Deadly Foes & Spider-Island Spotlight. 
Welcome to Spider-Island, where a million New Yorkers suddenly possess Spider-Man's powers -- but none of the responsibility! Can Spidey play world-saving super hero while the Big Apple gets eaten alive from the inside out?
metadata.name: Spider-Man: Spider-Island
